column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I am in Chicago for work and so far have only had pizza at Pizanos since it's the closest to my hotel
column2: but tonight I decided to give Lou's a try and it did not disappoint.  I got the Malnati Classic and it was awesome
column3: fresh ingredients and sausage in EVERY bite!!  If I am being honest though the infamous butter crust disappointed
column4: I actually like Pizanos crust better
